title: Prison Escape
description: Roomscale VR Escape room designed for naive guests. Worked as Unity programmer in 5 person team, rapidly creating experiences in 2 weeks, from concept inception to playtesting and iteration.

details.focus: VR design, naive guest experience, playtesting, rapid development

title: Little Match Girl MR Experience
description: Visual storytelling experience where players traverse between real and virtual worlds. Responsible for audio design and integrated FMOD, creating adaptive soundscapes.

title: Breathe Deep
description: Global Game Jam Pittsburgh submission that won Jammer's Award. Worked as programmer and technical sound designer, implementing bubble mechanics and FMOD integration.

title: Husky Hangout
description: Mobile app designed to help international students at University of Washington find community through shared interests.

title: MiniJava Compiler
description: Developed full compiler for MiniJava (Java subset). Implemented lexical analysis, syntax parsing, AST traversal for type checking, and code generation.

title: MUPL Interpreter
description: Built Made-Up-Programming_Language(MUPL) interpreter in Racket, implementing functional programming language concepts such as first-class functions, lexical scoping, and macros.

title: Pacman AI Agent
description: Implemented pathfinding algorithms including BFS, DFS, and A*, as well as adversarial agent decision-making and pruning optimizationfor Pacman environment.

title: spelunx - CAVERN Toolkit
description: Developed beginner-friendly toolkit including Unity SDK, documentation and tutorials, and sample experiences to empower creators to focus on designing for this proprietary novel immersive platform. Worked as gameplay programmer for the sample scenes, user researcher for developer experience, documentation lead for tutorials and development process on project website, and audio designer for surround audio research.
role: Gameplay Programmer, User Researcher, Documentation Lead, Audio Designer

details.focus: Developer experience research, playtesting, surround sound design, sample scene development

title: TACIT - R&D for VR Haptics in Emotional Storytelling
description: Produced R&D project investigating haptic glove feedback for emotional storytelling in VR. Led playtesting strategy and facilitated cross-disciplinary collaboration. Developed prototyping artifacts for rapid user testing using Unity 6 and Meta all-in-one SDK. Engineered final experience along with 2 other programmers. Documented research notes and design insights findings and development process on project website.

details.focus: Innovative haptic R&D, playtesting, prototype development,cross-disciplinary collaboration
details.tools: Unity 6, Meta SDK, bHaptics TactGlove, Trello

title: Two to Foxtrot
description: Created 2-player co-op platformer where players see different aspects of the world. Served as main programmer implementing player systems and puzzle mechanics.

title: EiAi - UX Research on LLMs usage in UX Designers
description: Explored how UX designers utilize LLM tools to understand hard-to-reach user populations through mixed methods research including contextual inquiry, usability testing, artifact assumptions, and speed dating.

title: Voice in the Void
description: Game jam submission for That Game Company X Coreblazer Jam. A relaxation building game where players connect with AI aliens' encrypted messages with a generous heart.
